005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public final class ArrayPut {
027  @NonNull
028  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
029      .name("put")
030      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
031      .deterministic()
032      .contextIndependent()
033      .focusIndependent()
034      .argument(IArgument.builder()
035          .name("array")
036          .type(IArrayItem.class)
037          .one()
038          .build())
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("position")
041          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .argument(IArgument.builder()
045          .name("member")
046          .type(IItem.class)
047          .zeroOrMore()
048          .build())
049      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
050      .returnOne()
051      .functionHandler(ArrayPut::execute)
052      .build();
053
054  private ArrayPut() {
055    // disable construction
056  }
057
058  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
059  @NonNull
060  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
061      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
062      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
063      IItem focus) {
064    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
065        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
066    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
067    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") T member = (T) arguments.get(2).toCollectionValue();
068
069    return put(array, position, member).asSequence();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
074   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
075   *
076   * @param <T>
077   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
078   * @param array
079   *          the target Metapath array
080   * @param positionItem
081   *          the integer position of the item to replace
082   * @param member
083   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
084   * @return a new array containing the modification
085   * @throws ArrayException
086   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
087   */
088  @NonNull
089  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
090      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
091      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem,
092      @NonNull T member) {
093    return put(array, positionItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), member);
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
098   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
099   *
100   * @param <T>
101   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
102   * @param array
103   *          the target Metapath array
104   * @param position
105   *          the integer position of the item to replace
106   * @param member
107   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
108   * @return a new array containing the modification
109   * @throws ArrayException
110   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
111   */
112  @NonNull
113  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
114      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
115      int position,
116      @NonNull T member) {
117    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
118    try {
119      copy.set(position - 1, member);
120    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
121      throw new ArrayException(
122          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
123          String.format("The position %d is outside the range of values for the array of size '%d'.",
124              position,
125              copy.size()),
126          ex);
127    }
128
129    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
130  }
131}
